dcterms:description: The FNC-1 dataset is designed for stance detection, containing 75,385 labeled headlines and articles categorized into four labels: agree, disagree, discuss, and unrelated. It aims to explore how AI technologies can be employed to tackle fake news problems and encourages the development of new tools for assisting human fact-checkers.
dcterms:title: FNC-1 Dataset
